articles.title: AstraZeneca CEO expects to run new global trial of COVID-19 vaccine: Bloomberg - Reuters
articles.description: AstraZeneca is likely to run an additional global trial to assess the efficacy of its COVID-19 vaccine using a lower dosage, its chief executive was quoted as saying on Thursday amid questions over the results of its late-stage study.
